channel.title: Posts on Coding Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Coding Architect

item.title: Lab notebook: Porting 550K LoC of C/C++ from Windows to Linux
item.description: As a part of Native Cloud transformation at my work I’ve ported a financial library from Windows to Linux. The library consists of 250K LoC of C and 300K LoC of C++.

item.title: Remote debugging of C/C++ code with Visual Studio Code
item.description: I’m currently porting a proprietary C/C++ financial calculations library to Linux. During the work I need to debug the code on a remote Linux machine. In the article I will describe two ways of remote debugging of C/C++ code executed on Linux using Visual Studio Code.
